text: Michael Ebenezer Kwadjo Omari Owuo Jr. (born 26 July 1993), better known by his stage name Stormzy, is a English rapper and singer. He has collaborated with Ed Sheeran on the singles "Take Me Back to London" and "Own It" (alongside Burna Boy). ==Works== In 2017, he released his first album Gangs, Signs, & Prayers. The album included the single "Blinded By Your Grace" featuring MNEK. He featured on a remix of Ed Sheeran's "Shape of You" which reached number one on the UK Singles Chart. In December 2019, he released his second album Heavy Is The Head. The album included the singles "Vossi Bop" and "Own It" (featuring Ed Sheeran and Burna Boy). He has worked with other artists like Charlie Sloth and Jaykae. Stormzy has supported Aitch and Chip supported Stormzy. He won the Mercury Prize. == References == Category:1993 births Category:Black British musicians Category:English R&B; singers Category:English rappers Category:Grime music artists Category:Singers from London Category:Living people Category:English musicians
title: Stormzy
